files.patch:
@@ -3179,2 +3179,2 @@
-// Int Immediate: power of 2, positive
-operand immI_bitmask()
+// Int Immediate: 2^n-1, postive
+operand immI_Pow2M1()
@@ -3183,1 +3183,1 @@
-            && ((n->get_int() & 0xc0000000) == 0)
+            && (n->get_int() > 0)
@@ -9170,1 +9170,1 @@
-instruct convI2LAndI_reg_immIbitmask(rRegL dst, rRegI src, immI_bitmask mask, rRegI tmp, rFlagsReg cr)
+instruct convI2LAndI_reg_immIbitmask(rRegL dst, rRegI src,  immI_Pow2M1 mask, rRegI tmp, rFlagsReg cr)
@@ -9176,1 +9176,1 @@
-  format %{ "bzhiq $dst, $src, $mask \t# using $tmp as TEMP, int & immI_bitmask -> long" %}
+  format %{ "bzhiq $dst, $src, $mask \t# using $tmp as TEMP, int &  immI_Pow2M1 -> long" %}
@@ -9178,1 +9178,0 @@
-    assert(VM_Version::supports_bmi2(), "required");
